about.title: Professional Personal Assistance
about.description: Luzi Home Health Services LLC is dedicated to providing exceptional Personal Assistance Services (PAS) in San Antonio and surrounding areas. Our certified caregivers deliver compassionate care with dignity, respect, and genuine human connection.

services.title: Professional PAS Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Personal Assistance Services (PAS) designed to support independence and enhance quality of life in the comfort of your home.

serviceCards.title: Companionship Care
serviceCards.description: Emotional support and company for clients. Our certified caregivers provide meaningful companionship, engaging conversations, and social interaction to combat loneliness and enhance mental well-being.

serviceCards.title: Personal Hygiene Assistance
serviceCards.description: Bathing, grooming, and dressing support with dignity and respect. We assist with all personal hygiene needs while maintaining privacy and promoting independence.

serviceCards.title: Mobility Support
serviceCards.description: Help with walking, transfers, and safe movement throughout the home. Our caregivers ensure safe mobility while encouraging independence and preventing falls.

serviceCards.title: Meal Preparation & Feeding
serviceCards.description: Nutritious meals and feeding assistance for optimal health. We prepare healthy, balanced meals and provide feeding support when needed.

serviceCards.title: Medication Reminders
serviceCards.description: Ensuring timely and accurate medication intake. Our caregivers provide gentle reminders and assistance with medication management for better health outcomes.

serviceCards.title: Light Housekeeping
serviceCards.description: Maintaining a safe and clean home environment. We provide light housekeeping services to ensure a comfortable, safe living space for our clients.

testimonials.title: What San Antonio Families Say
testimonials.subtitle: Read stories from families who have experienced the Luzi Home Health Services difference.

testimonials.feedback: My mother needed help with daily activities after her surgery. Luzi Home Health Services provided excellent Personal Assistance Services. Their caregiver is professional, caring, and really understands her needs. It's been a blessing for our family.
testimonials.name: Michael R.

testimonials.feedback: When my father needed mobility support, I was worried about finding the right help. Luzi Home Health Services made it possible for him to stay independent at home. Their Personal Assistance Services are exactly what we needed.
testimonials.name: Jennifer M.

testimonials.feedback: At 85, I wanted to stay in my own home. Luzi Home Health Services made that possible with their Personal Assistance Services. My caregiver helps with everything I need while respecting my independence. I couldn't be happier.
testimonials.name: Robert S.

testimonials.feedback: After my fall, I needed help with personal care and mobility. Luzi Home Health Services provided compassionate Personal Assistance Services that helped me recover safely at home. Their caregivers are truly professional.
testimonials.name: Maria L.

testimonials.feedback: My wife needed companionship and meal preparation help. Luzi Home Health Services' Personal Assistance Services have been wonderful. Their caregiver is like family and provides exactly the support we needed.
testimonials.name: David H.

testimonials.feedback: I was hesitant about Personal Assistance Services, but Luzi Home Health Services changed my mind completely. Their caregiver is professional, kind, and helps me maintain my independence. I highly recommend them.
testimonials.name: Eleanor W.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our Personal Assistance Services (PAS) and how we can help your family in San Antonio.

questions.question: What Personal Assistance Services does Luzi Home Health Services provide?
questions.answer: We offer comprehensive Personal Assistance Services (PAS) including Companionship Care, Personal Hygiene Assistance, Mobility Support, Meal Preparation & Feeding, Medication Reminders, and Light Housekeeping. All services are provided by certified, background-checked caregivers in San Antonio.

questions.question: What areas in San Antonio do you serve?
questions.answer: We proudly serve San Antonio and surrounding areas including North San Antonio, Stone Oak, Alamo Heights, West San Antonio, East San Antonio, and South San Antonio. Our goal is to bring professional Personal Assistance Services directly to your doorstep.

questions.question: Are your caregivers licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, all our caregivers are certified in Personal Assistance Services, thoroughly background-checked, and bonded. Luzi Home Health Services LLC is fully licensed and insured to provide peace of mind for you and your family.

questions.question: How do you create personalized Personal Assistance Services plans?
questions.answer: We start with a comprehensive assessment of your needs, preferences, and health conditions. Our team then develops a customized Personal Assistance Services plan that addresses specific requirements while maintaining dignity and independence.

questions.question: Do you provide 24/7 Personal Assistance Services?
questions.answer: We offer flexible scheduling including extended hours when needed. Our business hours are Monday-Friday 8:00 AM ‚Äì 6:00 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM ‚Äì 3:00 PM, with emergency support available when required.

questions.question: How much do your services cost?
questions.answer: Care costs vary based on the level of service needed, frequency of visits, and specific care requirements. We offer a free in-home consultation to assess needs and provide transparent pricing. Contact us to discuss your specific situation.

questions.question: Can I meet the caregiver before services begin?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We believe in the importance of compatibility and trust. We'll arrange for you to meet potential caregivers before services begin to ensure the best possible match for your family's needs.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the caregiver?
questions.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you're not completely satisfied with your caregiver, we'll work with you to address concerns and, if necessary, provide a replacement caregiver at no additional cost.

ctaSection.title: Still have questions?
ctaSection.description: Our team is here to help. Contact us for a free consultation.
